original: Inductive System : Type := | TSort | TProd (T1 T2 : System) | TArr (T1 T2 : System). Inductive Term : Type := | Var (x : string) | App (a1 a2 : Term) | Lam (t : Term) | Neutral. Definition SysPrf (T : System) (t : Term) := match T with | TSort => True | TProd _ _ => True | TArr _ _ => True end. Definition equal t1 t2 := match t1, t2 with | Var x1, Var x2 => x1 = x2 | App a1 b1, App a2 b2 => equal a1 a2 /\ equal b1 b2 | Lam t1, Lam t2 => equal t1 t2 | _, _ => False end. Definition neutral := Lam Neutral.
